languages.text: "Предвкушайте, не теряйте уверенности и ожидайте, шерин. Великий ответит на ваши молитвы, я верю".
"Savour the anticipation, shereen. Wait, and do not lose confidence."
languages.original_text: "Предвкушайте, не теряйте уверенности и ожидайте, шерин. Великий ответит на ваши молитвы, я верю".

traits.locale_text: "Savour the anticipation, shereen. Wait, and do not lose confidence. I have faith that the Exalted One will answer your prayers."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Savour the anticipation, shereen. Wait, and do not lose confidence. I have faith that the Exalted One will answer your prayers."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Savour the anticipation, shereen. Wait, and do not lose confidence. I have faith that the Exalted One will answer your prayers."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Savour the anticipation, shereen. Wait, and do not lose confidence."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Saboree la anticipación, shereen. Espere y no pierda la compostura».
languages.original_text: "Savour the anticipation, shereen. Wait, and do not lose confidence."

traits.locale_text: «Saboree la anticipación, shereen. Espere y no pierda la compostura. Tengo fe en que el Exaltado responderá a sus plegarias».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “请好好享受这种期待吧，亲爱的。耐心等待，不要失去信心。”
languages.original_text: "Savour the anticipation, shereen. Wait, and do not lose confidence."

traits.locale_text: “请好好享受这种期待吧，亲爱的。耐心等待，不要失去信心。我相信至高无上的神皇会回应你的祈祷。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「楽しみに待っててね、シェリーン。自信をなくしたりなんかしないでよ。エグザルテッド・ワンは、きっとアンタの祈りに応えてくれると信じてるんだから」
languages.original_text: "Savour the anticipation, shereen. Wait, and do not lose confidence."

traits.locale_text: 「楽しみに待っててね、ダーリン。自信をなくしたりなんかしないでよ。エグザルテッド・ワンは、きっとアンタの祈りに応えてくれると信じてるんだから」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Savourez chaque instant de cette attente fébrile, shereen. Soyez {mf|patient|patiente} et gardez confiance. »
languages.original_text: "Savour the anticipation, shereen. Wait, and do not lose confidence."

traits.locale_text: « Savourez chaque instant de cette attente fébrile, shereen. Soyez {mf|patient|patiente} et gardez confiance. J'ai bon espoir que l'Exalté exauce bientôt vos prières. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Genießt die Vorfreude, Shereen. Wartet, und verliert nicht das Vertrauen."
languages.original_text: "Savour the anticipation, shereen. Wait, and do not lose confidence."

traits.locale_text: "Genießt die Vorfreude, Shereen. Wartet, und verliert nicht das Vertrauen. Ich glaube fest daran, dass der Erhabene Eure Gebete erhören wird."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Savour the anticipation, shereen. Wait, and do not lose confidence."

languages.text: "Bu beklentinin tadını çıkar şirinim. Bekle ve sakın kendine güvenini kaybetme."
languages.original_text: "Savour the anticipation, shereen. Wait, and do not lose confidence."

traits.locale_text: "Bu beklentinin tadını çıkar şirinim. Bekle ve sakın kendine güvenini kaybetme."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
